title: Sampler, 1806
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross and star stitches on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Many bands of alphabets and numerals separated by narrow geometric borders, with the inscription.
